content:
DynamicMetaObject Class

In this Article

Represents the dynamic binding and a binding logic of an object participating in the dynamic binding.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DynamicMetaObject

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • DynamicMetaObject

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

For more information, see documentation on the CodePlex Web site and the MSDN article Implementing Dynamic Interfaces.

Constructors summary

DynamicMetaObject(Expression,BindingRestrictions)

Initializes a new instance of the DynamicMetaObject class.
DynamicMetaObject(Expression,BindingRestrictions,Object)

Initializes a new instance of the DynamicMetaObject class.

Fields summary

EmptyMetaObjects

Represents an empty array of type DynamicMetaObject. This field is read only.

Properties summary

Expression

The expression representing the DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.
HasValue

Gets a value indicating whether the DynamicMetaObject has the runtime value.
LimitType

Gets the limit type of the DynamicMetaObject.
Restrictions

The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.
RuntimeType

Gets the Type of the runtime value or null if the DynamicMetaObject has no value associated with it.
Value

The runtime value represented by this DynamicMetaObject.

Methods summary

BindBinaryOperation(BinaryOperationBinder,DynamicMetaObject)

Performs the binding of the dynamic binary operation.
BindConvert(ConvertBinder)

Performs the binding of the dynamic conversion operation.
BindCreateInstance(CreateInstanceBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

Performs the binding of the dynamic create instance operation.
BindDeleteIndex(DeleteIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

Performs the binding of the dynamic delete index operation.
BindDeleteMember(DeleteMemberBinder)

Performs the binding of the dynamic delete member operation.
BindGetIndex(GetIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

Performs the binding of the dynamic get index operation.
BindGetMember(GetMemberBinder)

Performs the binding of the dynamic get member operation.
BindInvoke(InvokeBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke operation.
BindInvokeMember(InvokeMemberBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke member operation.
BindSetIndex(SetIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[],DynamicMetaObject)

Performs the binding of the dynamic set index operation.
BindSetMember(SetMemberBinder,DynamicMetaObject)

Performs the binding of the dynamic set member operation.
BindUnaryOperation(UnaryOperationBinder)

Performs the binding of the dynamic unary operation.
Create(Object,Expression)

Creates a meta-object for the specified object.
GetDynamicMemberNames()

Returns the enumeration of all dynamic member names.

Constructors

  • DynamicMetaObject(Expression,BindingRestrictions)

    Initializes a new instance of the DynamicMetaObject class.

    public DynamicMetaObject (System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression, System.Dynamic.BindingRestrictions restrictions);

    Parameters

    • expression
      Expression

      The expression representing this DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.

    • restrictions
      BindingRestrictions

      The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.

  • DynamicMetaObject(Expression,BindingRestrictions,Object)

    Initializes a new instance of the DynamicMetaObject class.

    public DynamicMetaObject (System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression, System.Dynamic.BindingRestrictions restrictions, object value);

    Parameters

    • expression
      Expression

      The expression representing this DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.

    • restrictions
      BindingRestrictions

      The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.

    • value
      System.Object

      The runtime value represented by the DynamicMetaObject.

Fields

  • EmptyMetaObjects

    Represents an empty array of type DynamicMetaObject. This field is read only.

    public static readonly System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] EmptyMetaObjects;

Properties

  • Expression

    The expression representing the DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.

    public System.Linq.Expressions.Expression Expression { get; }

    Property Value

    • Expression

      The expression representing the DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.

  • HasValue

    Gets a value indicating whether the DynamicMetaObject has the runtime value.

    public bool HasValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if the DynamicMetaObject has the runtime value, otherwise false.

  • LimitType

    Gets the limit type of the DynamicMetaObject.

    public Type LimitType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      stem.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject.RuntimeType* if runtime value is available, a type of the stem.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject.Expression* otherwise.

    Remarks

    Represents the most specific type known about the object represented by the DynamicMetaObject.

  • Restrictions

    The set of binding restrictions under which the binding is valid.

    public System.Dynamic.BindingRestrictions Restrictions { get; }

    Property Value

    • BindingRestrictions

      The set of binding restrictions.

  • RuntimeType

    Gets the Type of the runtime value or null if the DynamicMetaObject has no value associated with it.

    public Type RuntimeType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The Type of the runtime value or null.

  • Value

    The runtime value represented by this DynamicMetaObject.

    public object Value { get; }

    Property Value

    • System.Object

      The runtime value represented by this DynamicMetaObject.

Methods

  • BindBinaryOperation(BinaryOperationBinder,DynamicMetaObject)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic binary operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindBinaryOperation (System.Dynamic.BinaryOperationBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject arg);

    Parameters

    • binder
      BinaryOperationBinder

      An instance of the BinaryOperationBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • arg
      DynamicMetaObject

      An instance of the DynamicMetaObject representing the right hand side of the binary operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindConvert(ConvertBinder)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic conversion operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindConvert (System.Dynamic.ConvertBinder binder);

    Parameters

    • binder
      ConvertBinder

      An instance of the ConvertBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

    Remarks

    In Visual Basic, only explicit conversion is supported. If you override this method, it is called by using the CTypeDynamic or CTypeDynamic functions.

  • BindCreateInstance(CreateInstanceBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

    Performs the binding of the dynamic create instance operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindCreateInstance (System.Dynamic.CreateInstanceBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] args);

    Parameters

    • binder
      CreateInstanceBinder

      An instance of the CreateInstanceBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • args
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - arguments to the create instance operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindDeleteIndex(DeleteIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

    Performs the binding of the dynamic delete index operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindDeleteIndex (System.Dynamic.DeleteIndexBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] indexes);

    Parameters

    • binder
      DeleteIndexBinder

      An instance of the DeleteIndexBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • indexes
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - indexes for the delete index operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindDeleteMember(DeleteMemberBinder)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic delete member operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindDeleteMember (System.Dynamic.DeleteMemberBinder binder);

    Parameters

    • binder
      DeleteMemberBinder

      An instance of the DeleteMemberBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindGetIndex(GetIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

    Performs the binding of the dynamic get index operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindGetIndex (System.Dynamic.GetIndexBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] indexes);

    Parameters

    • binder
      GetIndexBinder

      An instance of the GetIndexBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • indexes
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - indexes for the get index operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindGetMember(GetMemberBinder)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic get member operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindGetMember (System.Dynamic.GetMemberBinder binder);

    Parameters

    • binder
      GetMemberBinder

      An instance of the GetMemberBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindInvoke(InvokeBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

    Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindInvoke (System.Dynamic.InvokeBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] args);

    Parameters

    • binder
      InvokeBinder

      An instance of the InvokeBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • args
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - arguments to the invoke operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindInvokeMember(InvokeMemberBinder,DynamicMetaObject[])

    Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke member operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindInvokeMember (System.Dynamic.InvokeMemberBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] args);

    Parameters

    • binder
      InvokeMemberBinder

      An instance of the InvokeMemberBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • args
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - arguments to the invoke member operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindSetIndex(SetIndexBinder,DynamicMetaObject[],DynamicMetaObject)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic set index operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindSetIndex (System.Dynamic.SetIndexBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject[] indexes, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject value);

    Parameters

    • binder
      SetIndexBinder

      An instance of the SetIndexBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • indexes
      DynamicMetaObject[]

      An array of DynamicMetaObject instances - indexes for the set index operation.

    • value
      DynamicMetaObject

      The DynamicMetaObject representing the value for the set index operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindSetMember(SetMemberBinder,DynamicMetaObject)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic set member operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindSetMember (System.Dynamic.SetMemberBinder binder, System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject value);

    Parameters

    • binder
      SetMemberBinder

      An instance of the SetMemberBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    • value
      DynamicMetaObject

      The DynamicMetaObject representing the value for the set member operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • BindUnaryOperation(UnaryOperationBinder)

    Performs the binding of the dynamic unary operation.

    public virtual System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject BindUnaryOperation (System.Dynamic.UnaryOperationBinder binder);

    Parameters

    • binder
      UnaryOperationBinder

      An instance of the UnaryOperationBinder that represents the details of the dynamic operation.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      The new DynamicMetaObject representing the result of the binding.

  • Create(Object,Expression)

    Creates a meta-object for the specified object.

    public static System.Dynamic.DynamicMetaObject Create (object value, System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression);

    Parameters

    • value
      System.Object

      The object to get a meta-object for.

    • expression
      Expression

      The expression representing this DynamicMetaObject during the dynamic binding process.

    Returns

    • DynamicMetaObject

      If the given object implements IDynamicMetaObjectProvider and is not a remote object from outside the current AppDomain, returns the object's specific meta-object returned by stem.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider.GetMetaObject*. Otherwise a plain new meta-object with no restrictions is created and returned.

  • GetDynamicMemberNames()

    Returns the enumeration of all dynamic member names.

    public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> GetDynamicMemberNames ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable<String>

      The list of dynamic member names.
